articles.title: Germany set to vote on historic increase in defence spending - BBC.com
articles.description: German MPs could pave the way for huge investments to defend Europe against a threatening Russia.
articles.content:
Frank Gardner
Germany has been Europe's main donor of weapons to Ukraine
What happens today, here in Berlin, will impact the entire future of Europe's defence and its ongoing support for Ukraine.
